translation.en: [narrator] On July 10th, 1943,
a unit from Oklahoma,
composed of Mexican-Americans, Native Americans and Dust Bowl cowboys,
translation.it: composta da messicano-americani, nativi americani e cowboy,

translation.en: most of whom couldn't drink together in the same bars back home,
translation.it: molti dei quali non potevano bere nello stesso bar in America,

translation.en: landed in Sicily and began a brutal 500-day trek through Nazi-occupied Europe.
translation.it: sbarcò in Sicilia e iniziò una campagna di 500 giorni attraverso l'Europa occupata dai nazisti.

translation.en: This is the story of those men.
translation.it: Questa è la storia di quegli uomini.

translation.en: A group of soldiers known…
as the Thunderbirds.
How the hell can Coldfoot see anything? I can't even see my fuckin' boots.
translation.it: Come fa Coldfoot a vederci? Io non vedo neanche i miei stivali.

translation.en: -What's he lookin' at? -He's looking at the fog.
The fog? What the fuck does that mean? We can all see the fog.
translation.it: Cioè? La nebbia la vediamo tutti.

translation.en: Shut up, Spigs.
Just make sure you can see him. Yes, sir, Captain.
translation.it: - Guarda lui e basta. - Sì, Capitano.

translation.en: -[soldier] Get down! -[gunfire]
-Spigs, get down! -I'm tryin'! Ah! Shit! I'm hit. Fuck!
translation.it: - Spigs, sta' giù! - Merda! Mi hanno colpito. Cazzo!

translation.en: Oh, fuck.
Two Panzers, four platoons of infantry, 500 yards ahead.
translation.it: Due Panzer e quattro plotoni di fanteria a 500 m.

translation.en: Fall back to that ridge.
E Company, fall back!
Incoming coordinates.
-2-6… -[shouting continues] Nagles, shut up!
All right. Let's go, Nagles, come on!
No, no, no! Don't go under the trees. Stay out in the open!
translation.it: No! Non sotto gli alberi. Allo scoperto!

translation.en: Thanks, Cap.
Garcia, Rosa, check out that barn.
They fell back two miles south and they're still moving.
What's our damage?
Six dead or missing. At least ten wounded.
translation.it: Sei morti o dispersi. Almeno 10 feriti.

translation.en: I wanna know where the Germans are sleeping tonight.
Look out for booby traps.
Watch your feet.
Shit! What was that?
A rat?
Nah, man. Too big.
Must be a dog.
He was hiding in the barn, sir. He won't shut up.
translation.it: Era nel fienile. Non fa che parlare.

translation.en: We need Spigs to tell us what the hell he's saying.
translation.it: Ci serve Spigs per capire che dice.

translation.en: Found this in his hiding place.
All right, get him inside. Get some food in him.
Where the hell is Spigs?
-[slowly] Charlestown, Massachusetts. -[Spigs chuckles]
-[in English] But you know Boston? -Mh-hmm.
[in English] Boston.
[in Boston accent] Park the car in Harvard Yard.
Where did you learn to swim, Private Spigliani?
[Spigs] Fuck.
-Swim? -No, let me guess.
The boys' club on 2nd Street.
Yeah.
How the hell do you know that?
I told you.
I was a graduate student at MIT.
I lived on Maple, near the intersection of 4th.
translation.it: Vivevo sulla Maple, all'incrocio con la Quarta.

translation.en: And I dated a girl… named Hammel…
translation.it: E uscivo con una ragazza di nome Hammel…

translation.en: She had these…
beautiful breasts.
Sparky Hammel's sister, yeah.
[laughing] Damn!
You and me in Charlestown
at the boys' club.
-It's a small world, isn't it? -You can say that again.
translation.it: - Com'è piccolo il mondo, eh? - Può dirlo forte.

translation.en: Indians and Mexicans
and a wop from Boston?
translation.it: e un cafone italiano di Boston?

translation.en: Yeah. 157th Regiment from Oklahoma.
I got attached at Salerno as an interpreter.
translation.it: Mi sono unito a loro a Salerno come interprete.

translation.en: And their leader, he is an Indian, too?
translation.it: Anche il loro capo è un indiano?

translation.en: Capt. Sparks? No.
He's a cowboy. From Arizona.
Things must be getting desperate in America if they're allowing these types into your army.
translation.it: L'America dev'essere proprio disperata per accettare questa gente.

translation.en: Red men and Mexicans. Inferior races.
We don't see 'em that way.
They're Americans.
Like me.
Really?
I've been to Oklahoma, Corporal,
and the bars have signs out front that say…
translation.it: e ci sono dei cartelli con scritto:

translation.en: "No Indians Allowed. No Mexicans."
I've also been to Georgia.
They make their Negroes there drink from separate water fountains.
translation.it: Lì i loro neri devono bere da fontane separate.

translation.en: So don't tell me they're Americans just like you.
translation.it: Non dirmi che sono americani come te.

translation.en: Strange.
To fight for a country where you can't even enjoy a beer…
translation.it: Lottare per un Paese in cui non puoi berti una birra

translation.en: at the same bar as your fellow soldier.
So… please now tell me about the ponds.
translation.it: Quindi, per favore, adesso parlami dei pontri.

translation.en: Ponds?
Yes, I need to know what you did about the ponds.
translation.it: Sì, devo sapere cos'avete fatto con i pontri.

translation.en: What ponds? I don't know what the hell you're talking about.
translation.it: Pontri? Non so di che diavolo sta...

translation.en: -Jesus Christ! -Ponds!
-What did you do with the ponds! -We didn't see any fucking ponds.
-You're lying! -Jesus Christ, I'm telling you the truth.
translation.it: - Stai mentendo! - Cristo, è la verità.

translation.en: Your company crossed three ponds in two days.
translation.it: Avete attraversato tre pontri in due giorni.

translation.en: Here, here and here.
What are the conditions of those ponds?
translation.it: In che condizioni sono quei pontri?

translation.en: Ponte. Br-- Bridges. You're talking about bridges.
Yes.
Bridges.
I used the Italian word, didn't I?
My mistake.
Jesus Christ.
What are the conditions of those bridges?
translation.it: In che condizioni sono quei ponti?

translation.en: We didn't touch the bridges. They're all there.
translation.it: Non li abbiamo toccati. Sono tutti lì.

translation.en: Relax, Spigliani.
The war for you is over.
translation.it: La guerra è finita per te.

translation.en: You may even get to enjoy swimming in Charlestown again.
translation.it: Potresti perfino tornare a nuotare a Charlestown.

translation.en: But by this time tomorrow, your cowboy and Indian friends will all be dead.
translation.it: Ma a quest'ora, domani, i tuoi amici cowboy e indiani saranno morti.

translation.en: Hey, Captain.
The kid's looking at the photos on your gun.
translation.it: Il ragazzo sta guardando le foto.

translation.en: My family.
[in English] Where's yours?
-Jesus. Does anybody here speak Italian? -Yeah.
Yeah, I know a little.
-He says his name is… -[chuckles]
translation.it: Dice che il suo nome è…

translation.en: We, uh, we got that part.
[in English] He says his, um, mother and father died.
translation.it: Dice che la madre e il padre sono morti.

translation.en: He's been living here with his grandfather. Till he died.
translation.it: Viveva qui con il nonno finché non è morto.

translation.en: He's been hiding from the Germans for the last month.
translation.it: Si nasconde qui da un mese.

translation.en: We lost them, sir. They're using the rain to screen their movements.
translation.it: Li abbiamo persi, signore. Usano la pioggia come copertura.

translation.en: Ask him if he knows where the Germans are.
He says he doesn't know.
He's lying. Well, he's scared as shit, man.
translation.it: - Sta mentendo. - È spaventato a morte, amico.

translation.en: -Jesus, Gomez, what did you do to him? -I didn't do anything.
translation.it: - Gomez, che gli hai fatto? - Niente.

translation.en: -[laughing] -What the hell's so funny?
Ah, the Germans, man. They told him that first we were gonna feed him and then we were gonna do it to him.
translation.it: Per i tedeschi, amico. Gli hanno detto cosa gli avremmo fatto.

translation.en: Do what? Cut off his nuts.
Hey, man, tell him we're not interested.
translation.it: Ehi, digli che non ci interessa.

translation.en: -Tell him we already bagged our limit. -Tell him they're too small.
translation.it: - Che ne abbiamo abbastanza. - Poi, sono piccole.

translation.en: Tell him it's a lie.
Tell him the Germans aren't coming back.
We guarantee it.
Sir, are you sure you want me to tell him that?
Tell him those men…
are the grandsons of the greatest Indian warriors
translation.it: sono i nipoti dei più grandi guerrieri indiani

translation.en: to roam the American Plains.
They've killed mountain lion, hunted buffalo.
Tell him those men…
they're the descendants of the powerful Mexican army
translation.it: discendono dai soldati messicani che hanno battuto i francesi

translation.en: that defeated the French on Cinco de Mayo.
translation.it: discendono dai soldati messicani che hanno battuto i francesi il Cinco de Mayo.

translation.en: And those men…
they're sons of Texas Rangers…
who brought the rule of law to places where only killers and thieves lived before.
translation.it: che hanno portato la legge dove prima vivevano ladri e assassini.

translation.en: Tell him the Nazis are never gonna hurt him again.
translation.it: I nazisti non gli faranno più del male.

translation.en: Because tomorrow, we're gonna find 'em and stop 'em.
translation.it: Domani li troveremo e li fermeremo.

translation.en: There now. Doesn't that feel better?
No man should have to walk around covering his privates.
translation.it: Nessuno dovrebbe temere per le sue palle.

translation.en: He actually made the kid believe we could do it.
translation.it: Gli ha fatto credere che possiamo farlo.

translation.en: Wasn't the kid he was convincing.
[Gomez] Sir?
A gift from our young friend.
It was his grandfather's. He wants you to have it.
translation.it: Era del nonno. Vuole che lo abbia lei.

translation.en: I cut down the barrel to make it more practical.
translation.it: Ho tagliato la canna per praticità.

translation.en: He also told me where the Germans are.
translation.it: Mi ha detto dove sono i tedeschi.

translation.en: -Be safe out there. -See ya, kid.
Watch the grass in the middle.
[Sparks] It's not movin'.
Tank.
Panzer, two o'clock, 50 yards.
Let's go!
Come on!
Medic!
Get the Jeep.
Captain's been hit. -We need to take him to a field hospital. -Hold this.
translation.it: - Il Capitano è stato colpito. - Tieni qua.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Hurry!
[in English] All right. Hang in there. Hang in there. Stay still. Come on!
-Get him outta here. Now! -Here we go. Come on. Get him up.
translation.it: - Portatelo via da qui. Ora! - Ci siamo. Forza, tiriamolo su.

translation.en: Easy. Easy.
Keep that up.
[Coldfoot] Stop!
Go! Go!
At ease, Lieutenant.
It's not Honolulu, is it?
Honolulu's overrated, sir.
Really?
Don't spoil my fantasy.
Finished a stint in Hawaii, then three years of college. Why'd you re-enlist?
translation.it: Dopo le Hawaii, tre anni di college. Perché si è riarruolato?

translation.en: I ran out of money, sir.
Give the Army another couple of years, then go back and graduate.
translation.it: Dia all'esercito un altro paio d'anni, poi torni a casa e si laurei.

translation.en: That's the plan, sir.
You did hear there might be a war on the horizon?
translation.it: Sa che potrebbe esserci una guerra?

translation.en: I caught wind of that, yes, sir.
If that happens, we're gonna need every good officer we can get our hands on.
translation.it: Nel caso, ci servirà ogni buon ufficiale a disposizione.

translation.en: If that happens, I intend to be one of them, sir.
translation.it: Nel caso, intendo essere uno di loro.

translation.en: What got you in the Army in the first place? A sandwich, sir.
translation.it: - Cosa l'ha portata nell'esercito? - Un panino, signore.

translation.en: I had to leave home when I was 17.
Hunted all over the west for work,
ended up skinny and starving in San Francisco.
translation.it: e sono finito magro e affamato a San Francisco.

translation.en: Army recruiter bought me a meal, said that if I signed up, I'd get three just like it every day.
translation.it: Un reclutatore mi ha offerto un pasto. L'esercito me ne avrebbe dati tre.

translation.en: Your previous CO said you're good at handling problems.
translation.it: Mi hanno detto che è bravo a gestire i problemi.

translation.en: Well, I've got one. One of my companies, J Company,
translation.it: Io ne ho uno. La Compagnia J, una delle mie,

translation.en: has failed every live fire test for the past three months.
translation.it: continua a fallire tutti i test sul campo.

translation.en: -Do you think you can shape them up? -Yes, sir.
translation.it: - Può rimetterli in sesto? - Sì, signore.

translation.en: Good.
You've got one week.
-I'm looking for J Company. -Uh, over there.
translation.it: - Cerco la Compagnia J. - Da quella parte.

translation.en: [Gomez] Turn off that fucking gringo music.
translation.it: Spegni quella cazzo di musica da gringo!

translation.en: -[music stops] -As you were, Corporal.
Who's in charge here?
-Um, Lt. Danalli, sir. -Lt. Danalli is now relieved.
translation.it: - Il tenente Danalli. - È sollevato dall'incarico.

translation.en: My name is Sparks. I want a list of all prisoners and charges.
translation.it: Sono Sparks. Voglio una lista di detenuti e accuse.

translation.en: Uh, right away, sir.
Follow me, sir.
Drunk and disorderly.
Red Feather.
Assault and battery.
Assaulting an officer.
Assaulting an officer.
We get a lot of that in here.
Why are the men segregated?
The Indians and the Mexicans don't like each other much.
translation.it: Indiani e messicani non si piacciono granché.

translation.en: And they both hate us more.
Open the doors.
Sir? Open the doors, Corporal.
Clovis, New Mexico. There's a river down there, the Caheesh.
translation.it: Clovis, New Mexico. C'è un fiume laggiù, il Caheesh.

translation.en: Fishing any good?
[in Spanish] Of course.
What's that?
[in English] Gila trout. It's the best in the world.
translation.it: Trota di Gila, la migliore al mondo.

translation.en: Wilsall, Montana. Sheep country.
What do you do about the wolves?
We shoot 'em.
You any good at that?
I never miss.
Who the hell gave you that?
My brother.
Shit, I don't want you. I want him.
Private Samuel Coldfoot.
My name is Lt. Sparks.
The fact that I'm talking to you in a jailhouse
tells me you didn't get on well with your previous COs.
translation.it: non dovevate andare d'accordo coi precedenti ufficiali.

translation.en: Maybe you were told you're too stupid for this army.
translation.it: Vi avranno detto che siete stupidi,

translation.en: Maybe you were told you got a problem with authority or…
translation.it: che avete un problema con l'autorità o…

translation.en: maybe…
you were told you come from a race…
that's got no business wearing the uniform.
Whatever you've been told doesn't mean shit to me.
What matters to me… is performance.
There's a live fire test at the end of the week.
translation.it: C'è un test a fine settimana.

translation.en: Pass it…
and you can enjoy a weekend of freedom.
translation.it: e avrete un weekend di libertà.

translation.en: Forty-eight hours, not only outside this cage…
translation.it: Quarantotto ore, non solo fuori di qui,

translation.en: but off-post.
But…
like everything else in life…
this privilege must be earned.
translation.it: è un privilegio che va guadagnato.

translation.en: Now, if you feel
translation.it: Se pensate che la vostra esperienza nell'esercito americano

translation.en: that you and the US Army have reached the end of your journey together,
translation.it: Se pensate che la vostra esperienza nell'esercito americano sia ormai al capolinea,

translation.en: do not waste my time.
Or anybody else's.
translation.it: Né a me né a nessun altro.

translation.en: But if you want the chance to prove
that everything that every asshole ever said about you is wrong…
translation.it: qualsiasi cosa vi abbia mai detto lo stronzo di turno,

translation.en: you got two minutes to lace up and join me outside.
translation.it: avete due minuti per raggiungermi fuori.

translation.en: Shall we give them another minute, sir?
It doesn't take another minute to figure this out.
Lock 'em back up.
Who's missing?
Only Coldfoot, sir.
All right, Corporal.
-Line 'em up. -Were you bullshitting me
translation.it: In fila. Mi prendi per il culo o puoi farci uscire davvero?

translation.en: or can you really get us off-post?
translation.it: Mi prendi per il culo o puoi farci uscire davvero?

translation.en: Only if the whole group passes.
[Sparks] J Company, attention!
[Sparks] Marks.
Sir?
-What's the story with Coldfoot? -What story, sir?
translation.it: - Che ha fatto Coldfoot? - In che senso?

translation.en: He's been in the Army over three years. Why is he still a private?
translation.it: Perché è ancora un soldato semplice?

translation.en: Coldfoot got demoted, sir.
He used to be corporal. Up for a promotion to sergeant.
translation.it: Era un caporale. A un passo dal diventare sergente.

translation.en: What happened? He got turned down.
He blamed some NCOs, and it ended in a big fight.
translation.it: Incolpò dei sottufficiali e finì in rissa.

translation.en: The colonel…
busted him down to private.
He got in a fight because he was denied promotion?
translation.it: Una rissa per una promozione negata?

translation.en: It was his third rejection, sir.
Coldfoot is an Indian with pride, Lieutenant.
translation.it: Coldfoot è un indiano orgoglioso, Tenente.

translation.en: It's… it's not a very "healthy combination around here.
translation.it: Non è una gran combinazione qui.

translation.en: [master sergeant] No wonder you feather-heads lost all your land.
translation.it: Non mi stupisce che voi teste piumate abbiate perso la vostra terra.

translation.en: Here I thought it was 'cause you couldn't hold your liquor.
translation.it: Pensavo fosse perché non reggevate l'alcol,

translation.en: But all this time, it was 'cause you couldn't shoot worth a fuck.
translation.it: e invece è perché non valete un cazzo con un fucile in mano.

translation.en: What mojado taught you to fire a gun, Gomez?
translation.it: Quale sporco messicano ti ha insegnato a sparare, Gomez?

translation.en: Was it your melon-pickin' mother?
You got a problem with something, boy?
Well…
will you look who's back, boys?
It's Corporal… [chuckles] …I mean, Private Chillyfoot.
translation.it: Il Caporale… anzi, il soldato Chillyfoot.

translation.en: I thought we got rid of you, prairie nigger.
translation.it: Pensavo ci fossimo liberati di te, negro delle praterie.

translation.en: Trust me, it is just a matter of time--
translation.it: Fidati, è solo questione di tempo…

translation.en: Master Sergeant, can my men get a little more of your instruction
translation.it: Sergente Maggiore, darebbe ai miei uomini più istruzioni

translation.en: and a little less of your commentary?
Beggin' your pardon, sir.
I forgot you're new around here.
translation.it: Avevo dimenticato che è nuovo, qui.

translation.en: See, this here is my firing range.
translation.it: Vede, questo è il mio poligono di tiro.

translation.en: That means when your men step onto my range,
translation.it: Significa che quando i suoi uomini entrano nel mio campo,

translation.en: they become my men.
That's funny, Sergeant, 'cause the way I see it is…
translation.it: È buffo perché, per come la vedo io,

translation.en: when I bring my men onto your range…
translation.it: quando porto i miei uomini nel suo campo,

translation.en: you become their instructor.
So far, all they've gotten from you is a dissertation on their diets
translation.it: Finora hanno ricevuto solo filippiche sulla loro dieta

translation.en: and the sexual habits of their mothers, so…
translation.it: e sulle abitudini delle loro madri.

translation.en: how about doing a little work?
See, now,
where I come from,
a man don't toss words around like that…
translation.it: un uomo non sputa sentenze in questo modo…

translation.en: unless he's willing to back them up.
translation.it: se non è disposto a prendersene la responsabilità.

translation.en: What goes on behind that shed stays behind that shed.
translation.it: Quello che succede dietro quel capanno, resta dietro quel capanno.

translation.en: Very well, Sergeant.
Lead on.
You'd better start thinking how you're gonna explain these bruises, sir.
translation.it: Cominci a pensare a come spiegare i lividi, signore.

translation.en: What bruises?
Fair warning, boys. You go back there, you'll have company.
translation.it: Vi avverto, ragazzi. Andate lì, e avrete compagnia.

translation.en: He still alive?
Barely.
Good.
I was wondering how I was gonna explain that.
Shall we pick up where we left off, gentlemen?
Attention!
Good work, Lieutenant.
-Best scores of any group. -Thank you, sir.
translation.it: - I migliori punteggi di tutti. - Grazie.

translation.en: We credit the master sergeant with our success.
Excellent work, Master Sergeant. Sorry to hear about your little accident.
translation.it: Ottimo lavoro, Sergente Maggiore. Mi spiace per l'incidente.

translation.en: -Bring in the next group. -Yes, sir.
Come in.
There's a problem with Coldfoot. He's going into town.
-Yeah, he's got a pass. -It's where he's going that's a problem.
translation.it: - È autorizzato a farlo. - Il problema è dove andrà.

translation.en: [Sparks] Whatever you're planning…
don't.
They'll only call the MPs, have you thrown in jail.
translation.it: Chiameranno la polizia e finirai dentro.

translation.en: What'll that prove?
That nothing in this army leads to anything good.
translation.it: Che niente cambia mai in meglio.

translation.en: That's not true.
What if I told you I'd put you up for sergeant this week?
translation.it: Se ti dicessi che ti proporrò come sergente?

translation.en: No offense, Lieutenant, but I've been up for sergeant before.
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma c'hanno già provato.

translation.en: You wait and wait and then they give you an excuse and tell you no.
translation.it: Trovano sempre una scusa per dire di no.

translation.en: -I ain't waiting anymore. -You don't have to.
Get in the car, Sergeant Coldfoot.
[doctor] Is that your wife, Captain?
Yeah.
Lucky man.
On a lot of fronts.
The shrapnel went through your abdomen and sliced open your liver.
translation.it: La scheggia le ha lacerato il fegato.

translation.en: -You wanna tell me what the lucky part is? -You should be dead.
translation.it: - E perché sarebbe una fortuna? - Dovrebbe essere morto.

translation.en: Quick action by your men saved your life.
translation.it: I suoi uomini sono stati rapidi.

translation.en: If you ever see them again, I suggest taking them out for a steak dinner.
translation.it: Se dovesse rivederli, offra loro una cena.

translation.en: Speaking of seeing them…
when do I go back to Italy?
Maybe after the war.
Your combat days are over, Captain.
translation.it: La guerra, per lei, è finita.

translation.en: Next stop for you is home.
translation.it: È ora di tornare a casa.

translation.en: Congratulations, Captain. You've got a million-dollar wound.
translation.it: Complimenti. Ha una ferita da un milione di dollari.

translation.en: [narrator on newsreel] Italy,1944.
With winter setting in, the fighting south of Rome continues.
translation.it: Con l'inverno alle porte, la battaglia a sud di Roma continua.

translation.en: Allied troops are dug in, waiting for the next German counterattack,
translation.it: Le truppe alleate sono in attesa del contrattacco tedesco,

translation.en: which is expected any day.
The going is tough, but so are our boys.
translation.it: Il gioco è duro, ma anche i nostri ragazzi.

translation.en: Ask any one of them and they'll tell you it'll take a lot more than a little rain and mud
translation.it: Chiedete a chiunque di loro e vi diranno che non basta un po' di fango

translation.en: to get these GI Joes down.
I need transportation, Captain. I'm not that damn particular. You'll do.
translation.it: Mi serve un passaggio, Capitano. Andrai bene anche tu.

translation.en: Okay, now that you've seen it…
I'm thirsty. Let's get a drink.
It happened a week after you were wounded.
translation.it: La settimana dopo il tuo ferimento.

translation.en: My Jeep hit a mine.
It threw me 20 feet in the air, took off everything below the knee.
translation.it: Ho fatto un volo di 6 m e ho perso dal ginocchio in giù.

translation.en: Congratulations on your stars, sir.
Thank you.
Truth is, Felix…
in this war, getting promoted is easy.
The hard part is staying alive.
translation.it: È restare vivi che è difficile.

translation.en: Any news on the 157?
They're stuck on the Gustav Line south of Cassino.
translation.it: Sono bloccati sulla Linea Gustav a sud di Cassino.

translation.en: It's cold, wet and shitty. They're hangin' tough.
translation.it: È freddo, umido ed è una merda. Tengono duro.

translation.en: Who'd you send in for me? Kettleman.
translation.it: - Chi ha mandato al mio posto? - Kettleman.

translation.en: He's a good soldier.
He's not you, but he's okay.
translation.it: Non è te, ma è a posto.

translation.en: [sighs] When are they, uh, sending you home, sir? Next week.
translation.it: - Quando la mandano a casa? - La prossima settimana.

translation.en: I was going to offer to take any letters back for you,
translation.it: Avrei recapitato io le tue lettere,

translation.en: but I hear that won't be necessary.
You're right after me.
Yeah.
Don't act excited or anything.
I know this sounds crazy.
I feel I should be in Italy. I oughta be with my men.
translation.it: ma dovrei essere in Italia, coi miei uomini.

translation.en: Go home, Felix. Go home to Mary.
translation.it: Va' a casa, Felix. Va' da Mary.

translation.en: See your son, raise more babies.
translation.it: Vedi tuo figlio, cresci altri bambini.

translation.en: You've done your duty.
Safe travels, sir. See you back home, Felix.
translation.it: - Buon viaggio, signore. - Ci vediamo a casa, Felix.

translation.en: [Sparks] My dearest Mary…
I've never been a good letter writer, so I don't know if I can explain this.
translation.it: non sono mai stato bravo con le lettere e non so se saprò spiegarti.

translation.en: Hell, I'm not sure I can explain it even to myself.
translation.it: Non so nemmeno se so spiegarlo a me stesso.

translation.en: When I left you to come over here,
I was scared of losing you.
Scared of not coming back.
Scared of dying.
I'm not scared anymore.
[man] Sir?
There's an Army captain out there.
translation.it: C'è un capitano dell'Esercito là fuori.

translation.en: He wants to hitch a ride back to Italy.
[Sparks] I guess the only way to explain my decision is that it isn't my time to come home yet.
translation.it: L'unico modo per spiegarlo è dire che non è ancora ora che torni.

translation.en: Captain, what are you doing?
What's it look like I'm doing, Doc?
You're not ready for discharge.
You walk out of here, Captain, you'll be AWOL.
-[Sparks] Take care, kid. -Captain!
[Sparks] I know you want me home. Make no mistake, I wanna be home.
translation.it: So che mi vuoi a casa e anche io voglio tornare a casa.

translation.en: Desperately.
I wanna hold my son in my arms
translation.it: Voglio tenere in braccio mio figlio

translation.en: and lay with you on a quiet desert night beneath the stars.
translation.it: e guardare le stelle con te nel deserto.

translation.en: But I owe something to a group of men.
translation.it: Ma lo devo a un gruppo di uomini.

translation.en: Men who… before the war…
I'd probably never have known,
and now I know as well as I know myself.
translation.it: e che adesso conosco come le mie tasche.

translation.en: If I came home, I could never live with myself, knowing I owed a debt to them and ignored it.
translation.it: Non potrei mai vivere sereno, ignorando il debito che ho verso di loro.

translation.en: So I have to complete this journey I've started.
I cannot quit.
Anything less would leave a hole in my conscience that I could never repair.
translation.it: Lascerebbe una crepa insanabile nella mia coscienza.

translation.en: Capt. Sparks, 157th Regiment, 2nd Battalion.
Orders, Captain.
I was just released from a hospital in North Africa, sir. I was hoping to be reassigned to my old company.
translation.it: Sono stato dimesso, signore. Speravo di tornare dalla mia compagnia.

translation.en: What happened to your orders, Captain?
I didn't like 'em, sir. They were to send me home.
translation.it: Non mi piacevano. Volevano mandarmi a casa.

translation.en: Mary, I don't expect you to understand.
translation.it: Mary, non mi aspetto che tu capisca.

translation.en: I'm having a hard time understanding it myself.
But I have never been more sure of anything in my life and I have to trust that.
translation.it: ma non sono mai stato così sicuro in vita mia, e devo fidarmi di questo.

translation.en: So, please…
my darling Mary…
my dearest wife…
forgive me.
Get back to your foxhole, soldier. That's an order.
translation.it: Torna nella buca, soldato. È un ordine!

translation.en: Dios mio, it's the captain.
What are you looking at, Sergeant?
-[gun cocks] -Give me your report.
♪ Just before the sunrise ♪
